text: Footlight Serenade is a 1942 American musical comedy movie directed by Gregory Ratoff and stars Betty Grable, John Payne, Victor Mature. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * Category:1942 comedy movies Category:1942 musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Gregory Ratoff
title: Footlight Serenade
